== Proposed Additional Use Cases ==

  * To find an CJK ideographic character without knowing that character, Japanese users need search based on:
    # the number of strokes
    # radicals
    # hiragana strings (kun yomi)
    # katakana strings (onn yomi)

Any additional use cases members wish to propose for consideration should be added / linked to here.
